mapper.select: SELECT CODE, COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER WHERE CATEGORY = #{category} AND USE_YN ='Y'

SELECT (SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.profit_cost ) PROFIT_COST, (SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.big_group ) BIG_GROUP, DECODE(MIDDLE_GROUP,'0',' ',(SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.middle_group )) MIDDLE_GROUP, DECODE(SMALL_GROUP,'0',' ',(SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.small_group )) SMALL_GROUP, DECODE(DETAIL_GROUP,'0',' ',(SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.detail_group )) DETAIL_GROUP, TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_MONEY, '999,999,999')TRANSACTION_MONEY,SUBSTR(REG_DATE,1,10) REG_DATE,WRITER,ACCOUNT_SEQ FROM ACCOUNT_TB T WHERE t.writer LIKE #{userName}

SELECT (SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.profit_cost ) PROFIT_COST, (SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.big_group ) BIG_GROUP, DECODE(MIDDLE_GROUP,'0',' ',(SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.middle_group )) MIDDLE_GROUP, DECODE(SMALL_GROUP,'0',' ',(SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.small_group )) SMALL_GROUP, DECODE(DETAIL_GROUP,'0',' ',(SELECT COM_KOR FROM CODE_MASTER C WHERE c.code LIKE t.detail_group )) DETAIL_GROUP, TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_MONEY, '999,999,999')TRANSACTION_MONEY,SUBSTR(REG_DATE,1,10) REG_DATE,WRITER,ACCOUNT_SEQ FROM ACCOUNT_TB T WHERE t.writer LIKE #{userName} AND ACCOUNT_SEQ LIKE #{accountSeq}
